channel.title: regex on Hank's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in regex on Hank's Blog

item.title: 正则的实际应用
item.description: grep hank@hank:~$ cat grep.txt ooxx121212121ooxx ooxx 12121212 oox 12121212 1212 ooxx 1212 oo3xx oo4xx ooWxx oomxx $ooxx oo1234xx ooxyzxx hank@hank:~$ grep "ooxx" grep.txt ooxx121212121ooxx ooxx 12121212 1212 ooxx 1212 $ooxx hank@hank:~$ grep "[34]" grep.txt oo3xx oo4xx oo1234xx hank@hank:~$ grep "[0-9]\{4\}" grep.txt ooxx121212121ooxx ooxx 12121212 oox 12121212 1212 ooxx 1212 oo1234xx hank@hank:~$ grep -E "[0-9]{4}" grep.txt ooxx121212121ooxx ooxx 12121212 oox 12121212 1212 ooxx 1212 oo1234xx hank@hank:~$ grep "\<ooxx\>" grep.txt ooxx 12121212 1212 ooxx 1212 $ooxx hank@hank:~$ grep "[^0-9][0-9]\{4\}[^0-9]" grep.txt oo1234xx hank@hank:~$ grep "\(^[0-9]\|[^0-9][0-9]\)[0-9]\{2\}\([0-9]$\|[0-9][^0-9]\)" grep.txt 1212 ooxx 1212 oo1234xx hank@hank:~$ grep -E "(^[0-9]|[^0-9][0-9])[0-9]{2}([0-9]$|[0-9][^0-9])" grep.txt 1212 ooxx 1212 oo1234xx
